# üßæ SimpleScoreboard
*A lightweight and customizable scoreboard plugin for AllayMC.*

![Scoreboard Preview](https://github.com/Mythical-Games/SimpleScoreboard/blob/master/Screenshot_20251020_234057.jpg)

---

## ‚ú® Features
- üöÄ Lightweight and performance-friendly  
- ‚öôÔ∏è Fully configurable title and lines in `config.yml`  
- üß© Supports placeholders via [AllayMC PlaceholderAPI (PAPI)](https://github.com/AllayMC/PlaceholderAPI)  
- üîÑ Automatically updates scoreboard values in real-time  

---

## üì¶ Installation
1. Download the latest **SimpleScoreboard** `.jar` file.  
2. Place it in your server‚Äôs `plugins/` folder.  
3. Restart or reload your AllayMC server.  
4. Edit the generated `config.yml` file to customize your scoreboard.
